name: Nitrode
headline: AI-assisted game development platform
description: Nitrode is an AI-assisted gaming platform designed to transform your gaming experience. Whether you're an aspiring game developer or a passionate gamer, Nitrode empowers you to effortlessly build, launch, and play your favorite games. Leveraging AI, Nitrode streamlines the game creation and launching process, allowing creators to focus on their vision without getting bogged down by mechanics or technical complexities.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:consumer; industry:gaming; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Sejoon Chang, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & COO at Nitrode. CS & Product Design @ Stanford. Part-time Civilization strategist.

founders.name: Richard Gu, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO at Nitrode. CS @ Cornell. Chronically on Pokémon Go raids.

founders.name: Ben Kim, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO at Nitrode. Infosci @ Cornell. Minecraft and Brawl Stars aficionado :)

founders.name: Brian La, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CTO at Nitrode. CS @ Cornell. Your average tetris enthusiast.

generated_description:
### Nitrode: Empowering Game Development Through AI

#### Company Overview
- **Name:** Nitrode
- **Founded:** 2024
- **Location:** San Francisco
- **Team Size:** 4 employees
- **Y Combinator Batch:** W25
- **Website:** [nitrode.com](http://nitrode.com)

#### Mission
Nitrode is on a mission to revolutionize the gaming landscape by providing an AI-assisted game development platform. Whether you’re an aspiring game creator or a dedicated gamer, Nitrode aims to simplify the game creation and launching experience, allowing users to focus on creativity instead of technical hurdles.

#### Key Features
At its core, Nitrode is about making game development accessible:
- **AI Assistance:** Leverages artificial intelligence to streamline the game creation process.
- **User-Friendly:** Designed for creators to build, launch, and enjoy games without getting tangled in complex mechanics.
- **Community-Driven:** Features games developed by the community, encouraging collaboration and innovation.

#### Current Offerings
Nitrode hosts a variety of games for users to play and enjoy, including:
- **Bullet Shower:** Dodge bullets in a fun, spirited blob adventure.
- **Dodge the Creeps:** Avoid being hit by the creeping enemies!
- **Dungeon:** A simple yet engaging dungeon exploration.
- **Physics Platformer:** Experience gravity-defying jumps and creative gameplay.
- **Pong:** Relive the classic arcade fun with this timeless game.
- **The Anachronist:** A 3D time-travel adventure game that bridges history with gameplay.
- **The Anachronist 2:** Another journey through time with fresh challenges.

#### Community and Engagement
Nitrode encourages its users to engage with the platform actively, with links to their social media and community forums. This creates a collaborative environment where gamers and developers can interact and share ideas.

#### Conclusion
With a forward-thinking approach, Nitrode is set to change the game development landscape by combining creativity with cutting-edge AI technology. The company's focus on community involvement positions it as a promising player in the bustling tech scene in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Explore more and start creating your games at [nitrode.com](http://nitrode.com)!
